about_me.des: I am a young data scientist with a strong background in mathematics. Through academic and professional projects, I gained significant experience in IA, machine learning and distributed infrastructure. Life is like riding a bicycle, to keep your balance, you must keep moving.

projects.CD4: The first step of our investment strategy was to found companies with good intrinsic values by scoring methods. Then we calculate the yield and the risk of the stocks we have selected to do portfolio optimisation. | #R
projects.d3js: Visualization of soccer ranking and pediction | #html #css #javascript #d3js
projects.Oil: Determine the quality of several wells of a Canadian oil field with their production curves per month using regression. | #R
projects.geoloc: We worked on a dataset furnish by Kaggle about speed dating information. We realize an analysis based on supervised and unsupervised learning. | #R #Python
projects.velov: Determining the evolution of the city's (velo'v) bicycle fleet and provide statistics and graphical information for each station. #kafka #spark

career.master22_des: Realisation of a python script linked to Mattermost, an open source live chat plateform, in order to provides natural language processing features.
career.master22_course1: Natural Language processing, text classification, key words detection, similar texts detection
career.master2_des: I chose a specialization in Data Science shared between Mathematics and Computer Science section of the University Lyon 1.
career.master2_job: University Claude Bernard Lyon 1 (UCBL) - Ecole Centrale - Liris | Lyon
career.master2_course1: Statistical methods and Regression Models, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Graph Complexity and Combinatory, Data Visualization, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine learning
career.internship_des: I work, in the IT department of the SNCF direction, on security exception management tasks, risk analyses supervision and technological watch.
career.master1_des: This formation allowed me to combine several disciplines that range from applied mathematics to computer science through economy and management.
career.master1_course1: Data analysis, Statistical classification, Linux and Security, Stochastic process, Statistics, Economy, Cryptography and Mathematical finance
career.bachelor_des: This course provides a multidisciplinary education that responds to the demands of companies in economics, statistics and computer science.
